channel.title: Ok guys last question almost got my server
channel.description:
Guys I finally got past portforwarding (I think) so i downloaded a source and edited the compile.bat. But when I press runserver i get this [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/e86d8p.jpg[/img]
And no client comes up? How do I ad a client or something?

item.title: Ok guys last question almost got my server
item.dc:creator: @Modern_warfa Modern warfa
item.description:
@Modern_warfa wrote:

Aight well I think I may have done something wrong because it cant connect to my server =-[ any ideas? the ip is heavensgates.zapto.org if somebody else can try for me

Read full topic
item.source: Ok guys last question almost got my server

item.title: Ok guys last question almost got my server
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

Modern warfa:

Ya, but how do I add the client to my server and I cant find any clients to download.

you cant link a client to load when u run your server…
a client has its own run.bat that you have to run, along with the server, to be able to use the client…

Read full topic
item.source: Ok guys last question almost got my server

item.title: Ok guys last question almost got my server
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Adam Adam
item.description:
@Mod_Adam wrote:

www.moparisthebest.com

There you are. No need to download one!

item.title: Ok guys last question almost got my server
item.dc:creator: @MrPurple436648 MrPurple436648
item.description:
@MrPurple436648 wrote:

Thats the server starter, download the client, and start up that Run.Server again. Leave that box open though, because if you close it your server goes offline.

So download the client to the source, and then log in. You should be set.

Read full topic
item.source: Ok guys last question almost got my server

item.title: Ok guys last question almost got my server
item.dc:creator: @badger41 badger41
item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

the server doesnt run a client, you have to download a client and run it seperately and then connect to your server.

Read full topic
